name: Hullabaloo
description:
Hullabaloo is an independent advertising agency working across 20 countries in Europe. We are a creative business, passionate about developing differentiating ideas for our client’s brands. Our staff come from all over the world, currently 9 different nationalities work in our head office in Prague.
Our intention is to give clients in CEE a strategic, disciplined and highly creative option to network agencies, and in doing so, create valuable, sustainable campaigns.
